New Records: Mohammed Rizwan became the first player ever to score in excess of 1,000 runs in T20 international cricket in a calendar year.
Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit three balls in a row from Shaheen Afridi into the stunned masses in the stands of the Dubai International Stadium to send Australia through to the T20 World Cup final.
Shadab Khan's 4-26 from his four overs of leg-spin were the best figures in a T20 World Cup semi-final to date.
Pre-Game Insights: Matthew Hayden, Pakistanâ€™s batting consultant, had warned on the eve of the game he was finding his range.
Post-Match Reflections: Defeat felt harsh on Pakistan, who had played some of the most thrilling cricket over the past three weeks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan star Mohammed Rizwan's days of hard work and humility in the UAE
Others: The game started at 7pm local time (3pm GMT) and was played in front of a crowd of 15,000 spectators.
